Name: Elven Rivers: The Forgotten Lands Collector's Edition
About the game: In this game in the genre of time management you need for a limited time to manage to collect and properly distribute the resources that you collect on the level. Sometimes it feels like the days of elven glory are already in the past. Celene hasn't experienced much in her months of service as a scout, and her missions so far have been so easy and peaceful even a child could undertake them. - Conquer over 50 story-driven Time Management levels! - Find unique collectibles and earn magical achievements. - Unlock 12 additional after-story levels. - Over 20 hours of exciting gameplay for any age.
